channel.title: Reverse Engineering on Malware Analysis: Or How I Learned To Love Frustration
channel.description: Recent content in Reverse Engineering on Malware Analysis: Or How I Learned To Love Frustration

item.title: HTB Challenge: Simple Encryptor Part 1
item.description: Pulling apart a custom simple encryptor from a Hack the Box RE challenge using Ghidra. Part 1 of 2 explores the static analysis process.

item.title: Starting Small: Analysis of recent vjw0rm variant
item.description: Analysis of a recent variant of vjw0rm. I walk through my approach to analysing the sample, the challenges I faced in completing the task, resources I leveraged to overcome these and finally the lessons I learned along the way.
